text:
I need help fixing a DM error message and what to update exactly to fix it:
`DisableException:raw_html` is disabled in this context, I do have in my footer `{% widget_block raw_html %}` references but if I remove just `raw_html` portion errors out even more saying `module_xxx is not a WidgetTag` , so how do I successfully convert this `{% widget_block raw_html %}` to what it should be?
